title: PROTECT CELL ULTRA 3 IN 1
long_description: PROTECT CELL ULTRA 3 IN 1 is designed to prolong the life of salt cells, delay corrosion, leave pool water crystal clear and improve bather comfort with just one yearly application each spring  . PROTECT CELL ULTRA 3 IN 1 also increases the efficiency of salt chlorine generators to improve water quality. Its balanced pH formula will not affect water parameters.
short_description: BENEFITS Preserves salt cells and delays corrosion Prolongs the efficiency of sanitizers Leaves skin feeling soft FORMAT 5 kg

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Lightly sprinkle PROTECT CELL ULTRA 3 IN 1 in front of the water return outlet.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Must be used once in the spring after the pool opening. Add PROTECT CELL ULTRA 3 IN 1 according to the application method and recommended dosage. Add the required quantity in 2 applications; wait 1 hour between applications. Wait 30 minutes after the second application before using the pool.

dosage.specifications: When opening pool in spring: Add 1.25 kg of PROTECT CELL ULTRA 3 IN 1 per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: DO NOT add the product to the skimmer basket. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
